packaging.markers.default_environment() → Environment[source]
class packaging.markers.Marker(marker: str)[source]
evaluate(environment: dict[str, str] | None = None, context: EvaluateContext = 'metadata') → bool[source]

Evaluate a marker.

Return the boolean from evaluating the given marker against the environment. environment is an optional argument to override all or part of the determined environment. The context parameter specifies what context the markers are being evaluated for, which influences what markers are considered valid. Acceptable values are “metadata” (for core metadata; default), “lock_file”, and “requirement” (i.e. all other situations).

The environment is determined from the current Python process.
